mentions.context: The Pytorch library (Paszke et al., 2019) for tensor computation allowed us to reduce the computational time while working with a large number of particles (N = 10 4 ).
The source code for the simulation can be found online (https://github.com/ MathieuForget/HeteroSpeed_Aggregation.git).
